<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\fc\6854823541_D10466_1836852\7513-1-ho.htm',USER='jmsproofassembler',CD='Mar  9 05:48 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="4" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-weight:bold;"><img width="205" height="88" src="g75132mai001.jpg"></font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">KRAFT FOODS INC.</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">2007 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Tuesday, April 24, 2007</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">9:00 A.M. EDT</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Robert M. Schaeberle Technology Center</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">188 River Road</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">East Hanover, New Jersey 07936</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="4" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:14.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">DIRECTIONS</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Robert M. Schaeberle Technology Center is approximately 1 mile
north of Route 10 in East Hanover, New Jersey. A map and directions to the
Robert M. Schaeberle Technology Center are provided on the back cover of the
Company&#146;s 2007 Proxy Statement.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="3" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:12.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:6.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><img width="8" height="8" src="g75132mai002.jpg">IF YOU HAVE NOT
VOTED VIA THE INTERNET <u>OR</u> TELEPHONE, FOLD ALONG THE PERFORATION, DETACH
AND RETURN THE BOTTOM PORTION IN THE ENCLOSED ENVELOPE.<img width="8" height="8" src="g75132mai002.jpg"></font></b></p>

<div style="line-height:9.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><hr size="1" width="100%" noshade color="black" align="center"></div>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Proxy Solicited on Behalf of Board of Directors</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Louis C. Camilleri and
Carol J. Ward, and each of them, are appointed attorneys, with power of
substitution, to vote, as indicated on the matters set forth on the reverse
hereof and in their discretion upon such other business as may properly come
before the meeting, all shares of Common Stock held by the undersigned in Kraft
Foods Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) at the annual meeting of stockholders to be held at
the Robert M. Schaeberle Technology Center, on April 24, 2007, at 9:00 a.m.
EDT, and at all adjournments thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">This card also serves to instruct
the trustee of each defined contribution plan sponsored by the Company or any
of its subsidiaries how to vote shares held for a stockholder or employee
participating in any such plan. Unless your proxy for your plan shares is
received by April 20, 2007, your plan shares will be voted by the trustee in
the same proportion as those plan shares for which instructions have been
received.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">This proxy when properly executed
will be voted as specified. If no specification is made, this proxy will be
voted FOR the election of directors, and FOR the ratification of the selection
of independent auditors. If you wish to vote in accordance with the Board of
Directors&#146; recommendations, just sign on the reverse. You need not mark any
boxes.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">It is important to us that your
shares are represented at this meeting, whether or not you attend the meeting
in person.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">To make sure your shares are
represented, we urge you to complete and mail this proxy card or vote
electronically over the Internet or by telephone.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="center">

 <tr style="page-break-inside:avoid;">
  <td width="47%" valign="top" style="padding:0pt .7pt 0pt 0pt;width:47.28%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><!-- SET mrlNoTableShading --><font size="1" style="font-size:6.0pt;">Using a <b><u style="font-weight:bold;">black
  ink</u></b> pen, mark your votes with an X as shown in this example.
  Please do not write outside the designated areas.<a name="UsingABlackInkPenMarkYourVotesWit_005542"></a></font></p>

<p align="center" style="line-height:3.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:6.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="1" color="#231f20" face="Times New Roman" style="color:#231F20;font-size:6.0pt;font-weight:bold;"><img width="8" height="8" src="g75132mai002.jpg">IF YOU HAVE NOT

AND RETURN THE BOTTOM PORTION IN THE ENCLOSED ENVELOPE.<img width="8" height="8" src="g75132mai002.jpg"></font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B. Non-Voting Item</font></b></p>

<p style="font-family:Times New Roman;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Change of Address</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:8.0pt;"> &#151; Please print new address below.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"><img width="575" height="40" src="g75132mai012.jpg"></font></p>

<p style="margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">C. Authorized Signatures &#151; This section must be
completed for your vote to be counted. &#151; Date and Sign Below </font></b></p>

<p style="line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;">Please sign exactly
as name(s) appears hereon. Joint owners should each sign. When signing as
attorney, executor, administrator, corporate officer, trustee, guardian, or
custodian, please give full title.</font></p>

<p style="line-height:8.0pt;margin:0pt 0pt .0001pt;"><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:6.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
